posts.text:
For those still thinking about the anti-masking campaign - (looking at YOU, mom) it was propaganda.

Source vid: www.youtube.com/watch?v=2n8W...

Individual article sources in alt text with transcript of what would fit

#COVID #corona #coronavirus #masking #vaccinations #mask #coronavirus #longcovid

Economics professors and departments are promoting their recent PhDs who are on the job market. This is so cool.

I've never seen humanities professors/departments do such a thing.

If you want to pursue a PhD, choose a department that champions your work.

2.synthesized_content: Bluesky, a decentralized social media platform, is gaining attention for its innovative approach to online interactions. It emphasizes user control over data and content moderation, aiming to create a more open and user-driven environment compared to traditional platforms. The platform's architecture is designed to prevent centralized control, promoting a diverse ecosystem of applications and services. Bluesky's development is ongoing, with a focus on scalability and interoperability to ensure a seamless user experience across different applications.
key_points: Bluesky is a decentralized social media platform.
It focuses on user control over data and content moderation.
The platform aims to prevent centralized control.
Bluesky promotes a diverse ecosystem of applications.
Development focuses on scalability and interoperability.
